textAfterTable: 2011: Played most of the season on the junior varsity squad … Caught a 56-yard touchdown pass in only varsity appearance in 48-21 win vs. Rhodes (9/10). HIGH SCHOOL: Earned varsity letters in football and two in track at Smoky Hill High School … Team captain in football … Caught 27 passes for 351 yards and six touchdowns as a senior … Two-time second-team all-league … Career numbers include 91 receptions for 1,113 yards and 13 touchdowns … American Chemical Society Award … Outstanding Junior recognized by the University of Colorado and the Free Masons … Outstanding Senior … AP Scholar with Distinction. PERSONAL: Majoring in chemical engineering with a minor in energy … Son of Vince and Mary Bartholomew … Cousin David Harris played football at Washington University. Recent Games Oct 11 Hendrix W, 59-19 Oct 18 Maranatha Baptist Oct 25 at Chicago L, 44-23 Nov 1 Case W, 28-17 Nov 8 Alfred St. W, 47-19 Nov 15 at Carnegie Mellon L, 17-16 Statistics
